channel.title: vanlife on Atoms of Us
channel.description: Recent content in vanlife on Atoms of Us

item.title: 10 Products for Vanlife We Can’t Live Without (and 5 We Didn’t Need)
item.description: Now that we’ve been on the road for ~4 months, we have a much better idea of what we really need and don’t need.

item.title: Our Journery So Far (The First 3 Months in the Van)
item.description: It has been three months since we quit our jobs, sold (almost) all of our belongings, and hit the road to travel America in our converted van.
